    • Method Detail

      • createSound

        @Nullable
ISound createSound(SoundType stype,
                              ResourceLoadInfo loadInfo)
        Creates a new sound entity that can be used for playing the audio file specified by filename.
        Parameters:
        stype - The kind of sound to start playing (voice, sfx, music, ...)
        loadInfo - Filename of the requested resource and related metadata.

      • getDisplayName

        @Nullable
java.lang.String getDisplayName(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath filename)
        Returns the human-readable name of a sound file.
        Returns:
        The name, or null if no human-readable name is defined.

      • getSoundFiles

        java.util.Collection<nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath> getSoundFiles(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath folder)
        Returns the paths for all sound files in the specified folder and its sub-folders.

      • getSoundController

        ISoundController getSoundController()
        Returns the sound controller, which provides functions for manipulating audio playback.
